en.title: Board of Secondary Education - 10th
en.description: Completed secondary education at MLP Girls High School with a strong focus on foundational academic skills and discipline, laying the groundwork for higher studies in science and technology.

en.title: Board of Intermediate Education - 12th
en.description: Completed intermediate education with a strong academic foundation in Mathematics, Physics, and Chemistry at Narayana Junior College. Developed analytical and logical reasoning skills essential for technical education.

en.title: Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science
en.description: Pursuing a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science and Engineering at VSM College of Engineering, focusing on core areas such as Data Structures, Machine Learning, Web Development, and Software Engineering. Engaged in hands-on projects and technical activities to build practical and problem-solving skills.
